value.title: Thoughts on AI ethics getting concrete and useful
value.excerpt: A new paper offers a solid accounting of tools that makers and end users can employ to better ensure algorithms are ethically sourced, developed and deployed.

value.title: AI ethics is growing up - towards an AI maturity model organizations can use
value.excerpt: When it comes to AI lessons organizations can use, the AI ethics punditry has been spinning its wheels. But there's good news: AI maturity models are emerging.

value.title: UK announces a national strategy to ‘level up’ AI

value.title: "F In Ethics": UN Chief Grades World On Vaccine Rollout
value.excerpt: United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres termed the inequitable distribution of COVID-19 vaccines as an "obscenity".

value.title: AI Ethics and Governance

value.title: Overcoming AI’s Transparency Paradox
value.excerpt: AI has a well-documented but poorly understood transparency problem. 51% of business executives report that AI transparency and ethics are important for their business, and not surprisingly, 41% of senior executives state that they have suspended an AI tool because of a potential ethical issue.

value.title: Communism and sitcoms inspire AI ethics at Salesforce

value.title: Ethical Artificial Intelligence is Focus of New Robotics Program
value.excerpt: Ethics will be at the forefront of robotics education thanks to a new University of Texas at Austin program that will train tomorrow's technologists to understand the positive — and potentially negative — implications of their creations.

value.title: US government forms committee to advise on AI competitiveness, ethics
value.excerpt: The newly-formed committee will advise the President of AI matters. It's no surprise that artificial intelligence is the future. So much so that the Department of Commerce is forming the National Artificial Intelligence Advisory Committee to focus on a range of issues related to AI.

value.title: AI Self-Driving Cars And The Looming Aggregated Statistical Trolley Dilemma

value.title: AI Ethics: A Call to Faculty
